name: (Wub)Step
description:
A very short game I made as part of a One Game Per Week For A Year challenge (this was week 1).

Game By: Flare
https://www.twitch.tv/fflare

Music:
Fred Kalland
Lord Commander Susken

With a little help from an unnamed mathematician as the first entry in the one game a week for a year project, look up more on my stream or discord :^)

Time spent to make: 16h

Controls:
Tap WASD to move
You can only move once per song beat
Each time you move you gain points
The more you move higher the point multiplier
If you skip a beat or get hit buy a red triangle you lose combo
Hold or to dash!
